Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13045 affecting package irssi for versions less than 1.4.5-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-13045 affecting package irssi for versions less than 1.4.5-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package irssi is earlier than 1.4.5-1, affected by CVE-2019-13045
